stories.original_headline: New catalyst turns carbon dioxide into clean fuel source
stories.original_summary: Researchers have found that manganese, an abundant and inexpensive metal, can be used to efficiently convert carbon dioxide into formate, a potential hydrogen source for fuel cells. The key was a clever redesign that made the catalyst last far longer than similar low-cost materials. Surprisingly, th
stories.fantasy_headline: Alchemists find new way to cleanse foul air.
stories.fantasy_story: The Alchemists' Guild has discovered a new method using common manganese ore. They can now transform noxious fumes into a pure source of magical energy. This enchanted process ensures their new artifact lasts much longer, promising endless power for magic lanterns and glowing crystals across the kingdom.

stories.original_headline: Scientists just mapped the hidden structure holding the Universe together
stories.original_summary: Astronomers have produced the most detailed map yet of dark matter, revealing the invisible framework that shaped the Universe long before stars and galaxies formed. Using powerful new observations from NASAâ€™s James Webb Space Telescope, the research shows how dark matter gathered ordinary matter in
stories.fantasy_headline: Stargazers unveil secret threads holding the Cosmos.
stories.fantasy_story: The Royal Stargazers, using their grand Celestial Eye artifact, have crafted the most detailed map of the unseen essence yet. This map reveals the invisible threads that wove the Great Beyond together, long before the first celestial lights or floating islands appeared. It shows how this hidden essence gathered all ordinary matter.

stories.original_headline: YouTube now blocking background playback on mobile browsers
stories.original_summary: YouTube has started to block third-party mobile browsers from using a background playback loophole. Background playback is supposed to be limited to YouTube Premium subscribers through the official iOS or Android app, but many people have been using browsers like Brave, Vivaldi, and Edge to get back
stories.fantasy_headline: The Grand Scrying Pool stops secret background viewing.
stories.fantasy_story: The Scribes' Guild, overseers of the Grand Scrying Pool, has ended a loophole for secret background viewing. This special privilege is meant only for its loyal Patrons, who pay extra gold for the official Scrying Device. Many had been using lesser scrying mirrors from other clans to bypass this rule.

stories.original_summary: The Tesla Model S is at the end of its illustrious 14-year run - and what a dizzying ride it's been. In 2012, when Tesla made its first Model S deliveries to customers, Facebook acquired Instagram. Apple launched the iPhone 5 and iOS 6. Barack Obama sailed into his second term. Superstorm Sandy shre
stories.fantasy_headline: Lightning Clan's Grand Chariot concludes its epic journey.
stories.fantasy_story: The Grand Silver Chariot of the Lightning Clan has completed its storied fourteen-year journey. Its arrival long ago truly transformed the ways of travel across the lands. It brought speed and wonder to many loyal patrons, marking an era of great change.
